title: An Act to permit the scattering of unclaimed cremated remains at sea

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Kearney of Scituate, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2462) of Patrick Joseph Kearney for legislation to permit the scattering of unclaimed cremated remains at sea.  Public Health.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Health
Hearing scheduled for 09/29/2025 from 09:00 AM-01:00 PM in A-2
